    var select = document.querySelector('[name="data_type"]');
    select.onchange = event => {
        var change_action = select.selectedIndex;
        var type_change = document.getElementById('search');
        if (change_action == 0) {
            var val = type_change.placeholder;
            var ad = val.replace(type_change.placeholder, '広告名で探す');
            type_change.placeholder = ad;
            $.ajax({
                type: 'GET',
                url: "/include_new/js_main.php",
                dataType: 'html',
                success: function(data) {
                    $('.search').html($(data));
                }
            });
        } else {
            var val = type_change.placeholder;
            var terms = val.replace(type_change.placeholder, '獲得条件で探す');
            type_change.placeholder = terms;
            $('.search').off();
        }
    }

                var pt_num = 0;
                total.innerHTML = 0;

                quantity.onkeyup = function () {
                    start_pt_num = Math.floor(parseInt(quantity.value, 10) * 1) +
                        Math.floor(parseInt(quantity.value, 10) * 1 * 0) +
                        Math.floor(parseInt(quantity.value, 10) * 1 * 0);

                    if (start_pt_num > 0) {
                        total.innerHTML = start_pt_num.toString().replace(/([0-9]+?)(?=(?:[0-9]{3})+$)/g, '$1,');
                    } else {
                        total.innerHTML = 0;
                    }
                }
            });

            // window.onloadかぶり対策

                        total.innerHTML = 0;

            });

            type_change.placeholder = terms;
            $('.search').off();
        }
    }
